Description: Rim sherd of Chian Simple Animal Style pottery phiale mesomphalos; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky black below; trace of lotus flower in added white and added red; below, two white bands; exterior: at rim slap-dash dot and billet pattern above key maeander frieze between pairs of bands; below, lion (head and legs missing), to right; two dilute lines below and traces of lower frieze.
Bibliographic references: Lemos 1991 / Archaic Pottery of Chios. The Decorated Styles (p. 297, no. 979, pl. 137)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1992) (phase 2)
